abstract.fr: QmidiNet est une passerelle de réseau MIDI via UDP/IP Multicast
abstract.null: QmidiNet is a MIDI Network Gateway via UDP/IP Multicast

description.null: QmidiNet is a MIDI network gateway application that sends and receives MIDI data (ALSA Sequencer and/or JACK MIDI) over the network, using UDP/IP multicast. Inspired by multimidicast (http://llg.cubic.org/tools) and designed to be compatible with ipMIDI for Windows (http://nerds.de).
